'''Energy Amplifier Fruition''' is an [[Event]] in [[Version 2.3]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2021/12/24 10:00 - 2022/01/03 03:59

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 20 or above

===Summary===
* Complete the [[Event Quest]] [[I, Researcher]] to unlock the event.
* During the event, Travelers can tackle Places of Interest and Deceitful Domains to obtain a challenge score for the Deceitful Domain. Once your total score reaches a certain amount, you can claim rewards such as [[Hero's Wit]], [[Weapon Ascension Materials]], [[Mora]], and [[Mystic Enhancement Ore]]. The first time you clear the challenge, you will also be rewarded with [[Primogem]]s.

===Event Details===
* When the Act begins, there will be three new Places of Interest. Travelers can head to designated location and defeat opponents there to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, and Mora.
* During the event, after completing all the Places of Interest challenges in Act I, you will obtain all of the Irminsul Fruit Fragments. Complete the "I, Researcher" quest to obtain the Energy Amplifier. Equip Irminsul Fruit Fragments onto the Energy Amplifier to gain bonuses in the Deceitful Domain.
* During the event, complete each Act's Place of Interest challenge to unlock a stage of Deceitful Domain.
* Before the Deceitful Domain begins, you can select a difficulty level and challenge condition. The score you receive for completing the challenge based on the difficulty and conditions chosen. You will obtain Primogems as a reward the first time you complete each stage.
* During the event, Travelers can challenge the same challenge stage multiple times to try to set a new high score. Your total combined score is the sum of your high scores on all challenge stages. When your total combined score reaches a certain amount, you can claim corresponding rewards.
